content.name: Week 1
content.des: Resume tips, old people singing, and the benefits of learning new stuff.
content.alt: Roman numeral I on orange paint-spattered background.

content.content: Bowl of Wellness

content.caption: 5 Resume Mistakes You Need to Avoid

content.content: As we are in internship season, our first resource for this week will be related to internships. In this video, Thomas Frank, a popular productivity YouTuber gives top 5 resume mistakes people make, some of the tips are really nice ones that we hadn’t come across before so check it out!
(ProfDev has also put together resources related to resumes and cover letters, we’ll leave a link at the bottom of this article because who wants to dig up The Hub, amirite?)
Slice of Happiness

content.caption: Old Men Singing at Tim Horton's

content.content: We hope this video makes you smile just like it made us!
Nugget of Wisdom
Learn about learning something new! This article explains 11 benefits of learning something new. Have we told you how much we love learning new things?!
We hope you enjoy the videos and have a fantastic week! (Don't forget to check out our cool website ;) )
Love and wellness,
Deceleroo MiCo and the MHS Team

content.name: Week 2
content.des: A Chinese parable, having fun at work, and the history of Happy Birthday.
content.alt: Roman numeral II on yellow paint-spattered background.

content.content: Bowl of Wellness

Many times we forget that we don’t have the full picture and we can’t see beyond the now. What you see as bad today may actually be good tomorrow #broadframing #ohnothatHCisgone. In this video, Prince EA reminds us of this using a Chinese parable.
Slice of Happiness
A must-see version of “Africa” by Toto! I bless the rains down in Africaaaaa *music emoji*
Nugget of Wisdom
Did you know that before March 2016, movies that sang the Happy Birthday song had to pay a company for singing it? Learn about the interesting history of the happy birthday song!
Have a beautiful week and enjoy the videos! (Don't forget to check out our awesome website ;) )
Love and wellness,
Deceleroo MiCo and the MHS Team

content.name: Week 3
content.des: Lies you tell yourself, a german sheperd, and a phenomenal woman.
content.alt: Roman numeral III on blue paint-spattered background.

content.content: Bowl of Wellness

content.caption: Seven Lies You Believe About Yourself

content.content: Newsflash: Your mind lies to you sometimes! *Shock emoji*. But seriously, we often believe thoughts about ourselves that aren’t true and in this video, you'll learn 7 lies you’re probably believing and why you should stop! (Honestly, though the video is awesome, so really, check it out!!)
Slice of Happiness

content.caption: German Shepherd Puppy With Swimmer’s Syndrome

content.content: This video is kind of long but worth it! Hear the story of starfish, the dog who had swimmer’s syndrome but has now overcome that!
Nugget of Wisdom

content.caption: How One Scientist Averted a National Health Crisis

content.content: Ever heard of Frances Oldham Kesley? If you haven’t, now’s your chance, learn about the woman who saved thousands of lives and so many unborn children!
We hope you enjoy the videos and have a fantastic week! (Don't forget to check out our cool website ;) )
Love and wellness,
Deceleroo MiCo and the MHS Team

content.name: Week 4
content.des: One Direction, a wedding dance, and airplane crashes.
content.alt: Roman numeral IV on red paint-spattered background.

content.content: Bowl of Wellness

content.caption: One Direction - What Makes You Beautiful

content.content: This is not our typical wellness video but the words in the song are very important and we feel EVERYONE should know this!
Slice of Happiness
Graduation anyone?
Nugget of Wisdom

content.caption: The Real Reason Boeing's New Plane Crashed Twice

content.content: Ethiopian Airlines flight 302 plane crash: 10 March 2019. LionAir, flight 610 plane crash: 20 October 2018. Watch this video to learn about what caused these sad events.
We hope you enjoy the videos and have a fantastic week! (Don't forget to check out our cool website ;) )
Love and wellness,
Deceleroo MiCo and the MHS Team
